text: Beijo is a song by Romanian music group Morandi. The song's lyrics are sung in Portuguese. The song was a popular summer hit in Romania in 2005, and in July of that year, reached number 1 on the MTV Europe and World Chart Express charts, overtaking singles by Coldplay, U2 and Shakira. ==Charts== {|class="wikitable unsortable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2005) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- !scope="row"|Romania (Romanian Top 100) |1 |} ==See also== *Morandi discography *List of Romanian Top 100 number ones of the 2000s ==References== ==External links== *Beijo Lyrics *With Morandi in Europe (news article in Romanian about Morandi's European success with Beijo) Category:Number-one singles in Romania Category:Romanian songs Category:2005 songs
title: Beijo
